Tskhinvali.title: Tskhinvali
Tskhinvali.byline: Tskhinvali (Ossetian: Цхинвал, Georgian: ცხინვალი, Russian: Цхинва́л) is the capital city of the separatist republic of South Ossetia, which sits in the Kartli region of Georgia.

Tskaltubo.title: Tskaltubo
Tskaltubo.byline: Tskaltubo (also Tsqaltubo) is a town in the Rioni Region of Georgia.
